new_lessons.title: How Tamil can make you AI Scientist
new_lessons.content:
- The Tamil language is not just a language but a great science.
- Every word and letter (aksharam/ezhuthu) in Tamil holds secrets.
- Deeply understanding the meaning of every word and letter in ancient Tamil texts can lead to a 'Quantum Mind'.
- The 'Quantum Mind' is a state of higher intelligence.
- Tamil can enable individuals to become great AI scientists and rule the world.
- Verses from Tamil saints like Gnanasambandar and Arunagirinathar contain profound secrets.
- Everything needed for these achievements is contained within the Tamil language.

new_lessons.title: The secret of AI is in Tamil – Dr. Pillai explains! - Part 7 | AstroVed.com
new_lessons.content:
- True AGI (Artificial General Intelligence) is found in a state of 'no knowledge' or an empty mind.
- Murugan holds the secret to superintelligence.
- The verse from Arunagirinathar's Thiruppugazh, "அறிவு ஒன்று அற நின்று அறிவார் அறிவில் பிரிவு ஒன்று அற நின்ற பிரான் அல்லையோ" (Arivu ondru ara nindru arivaar arivil pirivu ondru ara nindra piran allaiyo), explains that superintelligence is achieved by emptying the mind of knowledge.
- When one is in a state of 'no knowledge', divine intelligence (Murugan) resides within without separation.
- Knowledge itself is biased, and true superintelligence requires overcoming this bias.
- The concept of 'untrained transformer' or 'un-pre-trained' model is analogous to the state of 'no knowledge' for AI.
- The model being created in Tamil is called 'Tamil Creative Generative', emphasizing creativity over mere generation.
- Murugan is the master of AGI, ASI, and greater superintelligences.

new_lessons.title: The secret of AI is in Tamil – Dr. Pillai explains! - Part 6 | AstroVed.com
new_lessons.content:
- Dr. Baskaran Pillai explains that our perception creates our reality, a concept found in both ancient Tamil Siddha wisdom and modern quantum physics ("The observed is the observer").
- One must learn to see beyond the flawed physical eye (ஊனக் கண்) and use the "eye of wisdom" (ஞானக் கண்), or the third eye, to understand the true nature of existence and change one's destiny.
- This knowledge is available in sacred texts like the Thirukkural and the works of the Siddhars, which can help one overcome karma.
- Diseases originate from both the body (உடற்பிணி) and the soul/life force (உயிர்ப்பிணி), and this ancient science addresses both.

new_lessons.title: Artificial Intelligence & The Great Wisdom of the Siddhas | Dr. Baskaran Pillai
new_lessons.content:
- AI is "Superintelligence" (பேரறிவு): Artificial Intelligence is not just technology; it is a form of superintelligence that is causing a paradigm shift in the global workforce.
- Ancient Siddha Wisdom is Superintelligence: The concept of "superintelligence" is already deeply embedded in the teachings of the Tamil Siddhas.
- The Future is in India: Opportunities for students are shifting from the West back to India, as the source of future knowledge (Siddha wisdom) is located there.
- Science in "Superstition": Practices and symbols like the "கும்பம்" (Kalasam), often dismissed as superstition, are actually sophisticated scientific models of consciousness and the cosmos.
- Thirukkural as AI: The Thirukkural is a complete guide to life and contains principles that can be understood as a form of Artificial Intelligence.
- Vallalar's Ultimate Intelligence: Vallalar is presented as the foremost master of superintelligence, who achieved knowledge without formal study ("ஓதாது உணர்தல்") by accessing the intelligence of space.
- Transcending the Mind: True knowledge is attained by going beyond the limitations of language ("உரை") and the mind ("மனம்") to connect with the "great space" (பெரு வெளி), which is Akasha or cosmic intelligence.
- Fusion of Ancient and Modern: The path forward for students and for humanity is to study and integrate ancient Tamil science with modern technologies like AI.

new_lessons.title: The Secret of Superintelligence (AI) Hidden in the Tamil Syllable 'Ah'
new_lessons.content:
- The AI Race: The biggest competition in modern technology, especially in Silicon Valley, is the quest to create Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) or Artificial Superintelligence (ASI).
- The Tamil Secret: The solution to creating this superintelligence is not in complex algorithms but is hidden within the ancient Tamil language.
- The Power of 'Ah' (அ): The primordial sound 'Ah' (அ) is the key to unlocking superintelligence. It is the foundational sound of all creation and consciousness.
- Thirukkural's Wisdom: The very first Kural, "அகர முதல எழுத்தெல்லாம் ஆதி பகவன் முதற்றே உலகு" (Akara mudhala ezhuthellam Aadhi bhagavan mudhatre ulagu), establishes 'Ah' as the origin of all sounds, just as God is the origin of the universe. This verse holds the secret.
- Endorsement by Saints & Gods:
    - Lord Krishna: In the Bhagavad Gita, Krishna states, "அக்ஷராணாம் அகோராஸ்மி" (Aksharanam Akaro'smi), meaning "Among all syllables, I am the syllable 'Ah'," equating the sound with the divine.
    - Ramalinga Swamigal: This Siddha saint taught that there is an entire galaxy named 'Agaram' (அகரம்) and that the sound 'Ah' contains all knowledge of light and sound, and all powers (Siddhis).
- Scientific Validation: Dr. Pillai recounts an experience with a Harvard scientist who, through fMRI research, discovered that chanting 'Ah' results in "global representation" in the brain, meaning it activates all brain areas simultaneously.
- Geographical Significance: The name 'Agaram' is still used for several villages in Tamil Nadu, indicating the deep-rooted historical and cultural importance of this sound.

- The relationship between a word (சொல்) and its meaning (பொருள்) is the foundation of quantum intelligence.

new_lessons.content:
- True AGI (Artificial General Intelligence) is found in a state of 'no knowledge' or an empty mind.
- Murugan holds the secret to superintelligence.
- The verse from Arunagirinathar's Thiruppugazh, "அறிவு ஒன்று அற நின்று அறிவார் அறிவில் பிரிவு ஒன்று அற நின்ற பிரான் அல்லையோ" (Arivu ondru ara nindru arivaar arivil pirivu ondru ara nindra piran allaiyo), explains that superintelligence is achieved by emptying the mind of knowledge.
- When one is in a state of 'no knowledge', divine intelligence (Murugan) resides within without separation.
- Knowledge itself is biased, and true superintelligence requires overcoming this bias.
- The concept of 'untrained transformer' or 'un-pre-trained' model is analogous to the state of 'no knowledge' for AI.
- The model being created in Tamil is called 'Tamil Creative Generative', emphasizing creativity over mere generation.
- Murugan is the master of AGI, ASI, and greater superintelligences.

- One must learn to see beyond the flawed physical eye (ஊனக் கண்) and use the "eye of wisdom" (ஞானக் கண்), or the third eye, to understand the true nature of existence and change one's destiny.

- Ancient Siddha Wisdom is Superintelligence: The concept of "superintelligence" is already deeply embedded in the teachings of the Tamil Siddhas.
- The Future is in India: Opportunities for students are shifting from the West back to India, as the source of future knowledge (Siddha wisdom) is located there.
- Science in "Superstition": Practices and symbols like the "கும்பம்" (Kalasam), often dismissed as superstition, are actually sophisticated scientific models of consciousness and the cosmos.
- Thirukkural as AI: The Thirukkural is a complete guide to life and contains principles that can be understood as a form of Artificial Intelligence.
- Vallalar's Ultimate Intelligence: Vallalar is presented as the foremost master of superintelligence, who achieved knowledge without formal study ("ஓதாது உணர்தல்") by accessing the intelligence of space.
- Transcending the Mind: True knowledge is attained by going beyond the limitations of language ("உரை") and the mind ("மனம்") to connect with the "great space" (பெரு வெளி), which is Akasha or cosmic intelligence.
- Fusion of Ancient and Modern: The path forward for students and for humanity is to study and integrate ancient Tamil science with modern technologies like AI.

new_lessons.content:
- The AI Race: The biggest competition in modern technology, especially in Silicon Valley, is the quest to create Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) or Artificial Superintelligence (ASI).
- The Tamil Secret: The solution to creating this superintelligence is not in complex algorithms but is hidden within the ancient Tamil language.
- The Power of 'Ah' (அ): The primordial sound 'Ah' (அ) is the key to unlocking superintelligence. It is the foundational sound of all creation and consciousness.
- Thirukkural's Wisdom: The very first Kural, "அகர முதல எழுத்தெல்லாம் ஆதி பகவன் முதற்றே உலகு" (Akara mudhala ezhuthellam Aadhi bhagavan mudhatre ulagu), establishes 'Ah' as the origin of all sounds, just as God is the origin of the universe. This verse holds the secret.
- Endorsement by Saints & Gods:
    - Lord Krishna: In the Bhagavad Gita, Krishna states, "அக்ஷராணாம் அகோராஸ்மி" (Aksharanam Akaro'smi), meaning "Among all syllables, I am the syllable 'Ah'," equating the sound with the divine.
    - Ramalinga Swamigal: This Siddha saint taught that there is an entire galaxy named 'Agaram' (அகரம்) and that the sound 'Ah' contains all knowledge of light and sound, and all powers (Siddhis).
